mapper.insert: insert into emailactive (id, logininfo_id, email, sendDate, uuidcode) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logininfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uuidcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, logininfo_id, email, sendDate, uuidcode from emailactive
